attributes.action: Buy Russian Gas, Oil & Electricity lower cost of supply
attributes.additional_details: Because cost of living in the UK is a joke, inflation due to these sanctions are causing it. It will kill British citizens in winter. The dispute between Russia and Ukraine is there problem not the UKs. India, China and lots and lots of other countries are buying it for cheap. So it only hurts the UK.
attributes.background: Allow the wholesale buying of Russian gas, oil and electricity. Lift any bans in place and stop getting involved in other countries disputes. Focus on your own country and its citizens.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Immediately lift the sanctions on Russia
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622411
